A '''Floating Ray''' is an exceedingly rare sky-faring creature. While exploring [[Enkanomiya]], Travelers may encounter these mysterious creatures on land. When flying beside this ray, it will restore several [[energy]] particles. When attacked, it will disappear without dropping any items.
